eosDAC invites any service provider to offer IT/personnel procurement and advisory services to the DAC
15 November 2018

Since its inception, eosDAC has been aware that legal company structures as they currently exist in the world do not accurately map onto the DAC. The DAC is not a company - it is intended to function as a community of people working toward common goals, governed by agreement - the Constitution.

Read more ↗
Why eosDAC deserves EOS BP support?
15 November 2018

eosDAC is the first and currently only Decentralized Block Producer which isn’t owned by a private entity. Instead, eosDAC’s membership token was airdropped to EOS holders just before mainnet was launched in June 2018 so that eosDAC would be owned by the EOS community.

Read more ↗
Financial report for Oct 2018
11 November 2018

This is a summary of eosDAC’s financial balances held by Incommsec Ltd and the transactions conducted by them during the month of October 2018. This is the report of an eosDAC service provider; it does not report on eosDAC’s cryptocurrency balances or on-chain transactions, which are conducted by the DAC itself.

On timelines and crypto projects
10 November 2018

eosDAC is successfully maintaining a position as a top-21 producer, by being a well-respected and safeguarded BP on-chain. eosDAC workers are also preparing to launch voting for Custodians rapidly, and are working on this at full speed. Multiple members of the team are working 50-70 hour weeks to code and create the workflows including company and legal pre-requisites for this transition. It...

eosDAC reports active worker proposals, revenue and expenditure for August and September
23 October 2018

eosDAC is pleased to report its EOS expenditure in August and September, reflecting our priorities: secure and reliable block production; support for the eosDAC community and awareness of the token; and leadership around chain-level issues so as to support the EOS ecosystem in general and our community in particular.

What is involved in being a Custodian of eosDAC?
03 October 2018

eosDAC is an EOS block producer candidate with a founding mission to support and enable the success of DACs by providing open source tools and expertise. These include a suite of smart contracts that encode the DAC’s constitution into executable code and other governance, HR, regulatory and advisory support.

Read more ↗
eosDAC Opens Member Registration
03 September 2018

eosDAC is pleased to announce that it has fully opened its member registration function following trial release in late August 2018. EOSDAC tokenholders are invited to log on to https://members.eosdac.io to register as Members of the DAC. Owning tokens alone does not confer the right to vote or to receive benefits of DAC membership; token holders must register as Members in order to particip...
